mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CMT.REQ_CMT_SEQ) AS rowNum , CMT.REQ_CMT_SEQ AS reqCmtSeq , REQ.REQ_SEQ AS reqSeq , CMT.REQ_CMT AS reqCmt , CMT.DEL_YN AS delYn , DATE_FORMAT(CMT.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(CMT.REG_SEQ) AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(CMT.UPDT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updtDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(CMT.UPDT_SEQ) AS updtNm , 'TB_REQ_CMT' AS fileRefTb , 'REQ_CMT_SEQ' AS fileRefCol FROM TB_REQ REQ INNER JOIN TB_REQ_CMT CMT ON REQ.REQ_SEQ = CMT.REQ_SEQ WHERE CMT.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: AND CMT.REQ_SEQ = #{reqSeq} ORDER BY CMT.REQ_CMT_SEQ DESC
